about_the_game:
Ramhart is an RPG with turn-based combat and an exciting storyline. Use the latest implantation technology to develop your character. Immerse yourself in the story of the fighter Ramhart and find out who kidnapped his brother and why, and how the kidnapping is connected to the fateful events unfolding in the world in 2034.

2034: Digital Rubicon


In the world of the near future, most creative and intellectual tasks have been transferred to artificial intelligence, many people have been left without work. The main character of the game, Ramhart, is forced to fight in the arena to earn a living. His brother Christian is more fortunate - he is developing new models of Artificial Intelligence. Or rather, he was until recently - Christian disappeared from his home. Ramhart is sure that his brother was kidnapped, and undertakes to find him at all costs.

Dance of Steel and Lead


The game offers hand-to-hand combat, in which firearms are sometimes used. The battle is carried out in turns, each turn you choose one of the melee attacks or make a shot. Ammo is a scarce commodity, and in a battle of cyborgs reinforced with implants, punches and kicks can be as powerful as firearms.

Balancing on the edge of humanity


The future has not made people happy, but technology has stepped forward compared to today. In the game, your hero will have access to implantation technologies. Each implant affects 2 characteristics: it increases one, and slightly decreases the other. You will be able to create a unique character build, strengthening it in the chosen directions.

Fighters of the new world


Not only Ramhart, but also his opponents have access to combat implant technologies. You will face the powerful and unprincipled Abaddon corporation, on whose side not only ordinary mercenaries but also cyborgs fight. In the game, you will find many colorful enemies, both ordinary opponents and bosses.
